TextView.android:text: You’ve received further information on the statuses of your patients via the EMT’s. The explosion was in the kitchen of a restaurant; 3 workers were near the explosion. The patients ages range from 18-32. Patient 1 was closest to the explosion and has multiple 2nd degree burns and some 3rd degree burns on his arms and torso. Patient 2 has some burns on her back, all 2nd degree, and a broken arm from falling. Patient 3 was near glass that was caught in the explosion and has multiple cuts on her face and a piece of glass in her eye, her face is bleeding continuously from the cuts. Patient 4 is having trouble breathing from inhaling too much smoke from the explosion/fire. Patient 5 also inhaled too much smoke and had a loss of consciousness EMT’s picked him up in an unconscious state. Vital data over the last 5 minutes have been coming in, in addition to procedures performed by the EMTs.
